description:
Development Environment, Tooling Platform and Application Framework.

Apache NetBeans is much more than a text editor. It highlights source code syntactically and semantically, lets you easily refactor code, with a range of handy and powerful tools.
Apache NetBeans 27 installers / packages provided by Friends of Apache NetBeans.
For more information see the repository README.
These packages are built with NBPackage using the official Apache NetBeans release zip. The packages themselves are not released by the Apache Software Foundation.
